mapper.select: SELECT `language`.language_name, `level`.level_name, chapter.chapter_name, chapter.free_or_not, chapter.id FROM lt_chapter `chapter` LEFT JOIN lt_level `level` ON chapter.level_id = `level`.id LEFT JOIN lt_course `course` ON `level`.course_id = course.id LEFT JOIN lt_language `language` ON course.language_id = `language`.id WHERE chapter.`status`='putaway' AND `level`.id = #{levelId}
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM lt_chapter WHERE level_id = #{levelId}

SELECT `language`.language_name,course.course_name, `level`.level_name,chapter.chapter_name, `language`.id languageId,course.id courseId, `level`.id levelId,chapter.chapter_intro, chapter.manuscript,chapter.content FROM lt_chapter `chapter` LEFT JOIN lt_level `level` ON chapter.level_id = `level`.id LEFT JOIN lt_course `course` ON `level`.course_id = course.id LEFT JOIN lt_language `language` ON course.language_id = `language`.id WHERE chapter.id = #{id}

SELECT `language`.language_name,course.course_name, `level`.level_name,chapter.chapter_name, `language`.id languageId,course.id courseId, chapter.id chapterId, chapter.chapter_intro,chapter.duration FROM lt_chapter `chapter` LEFT JOIN lt_level `level` ON chapter.level_id = `level`.id LEFT JOIN lt_course `course` ON `level`.course_id = course.id LEFT JOIN lt_language `language` ON course.language_id = `language`.id WHERE `level`.id = #{levelId}
